asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/Product.asp?SKU=18843102
This beautifully designed luxurious memory foam rug has a multi-textured weave for both softness and durability. This foam rug has a non-skid backing and is for indoor use only. The perfect way to add some comfortability and style to your home. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: If you're looking for an accent rug to place throughout your home that's luxurious and comfortable. The micro dry fiber rug is a great choice. These drugs are constructed of an innovative memory foam for the ultimate in comfort and incredible cushioning the multi textured weave on top for vide softness and dirt billet and the backing is like a built in drug pad. So it's good resistant. These rugs are perfect accent to place anywhere in your home. You can find these rugs in assorted sizes and colors. The microwave dry ultimate luxury memory foam rug is available online and at a bed bath and beyond store near you.
